If a bug affects '''Linux''', you shall classify it as a kernel bug. For that:

1. Below the bug description, into the tag list, add the appropriate <nowiki>[[Kernel-Tagging|kernel tags]]</nowiki>.
2. Ask the user to test if the bug also takes place when using the <nowiki>[[Kernel-MainlineBuilds|mainline builds]]</nowiki>.
